name: Danganronpa: Tracks
description:
Junko Enoshima did not trigger the Tragedy, did not start the Killing Game. Set in the future of the Ultimate Talent Development Plan/Danganronpa S, this game focuses on the children of my personal ships.

But just because Junko didn't start the Tragedy, doesn't mean it was guaranteed to never happen.

16 students, all having just begin their time at Hope's Peak, have found themselves in the very killing game that their parents avoided.

But this game is unique.

You'll get to choose which one to play as, after all - and each one has their own story to tell. Their own deaths - their own class trials.

Now, then... Let this branching tale of Danganronpa, of hope and despair, of truth and lies, begin.

!!!!THIS GAME IS NOT YET AVAILABLE TO PLAY!!!!

(This fangan and its creator are not affiliated with Spike Chunsoft or Kazutaka Kodaka)
